title: Seasonal (B)
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark LRC, in pencil: [Seasonal (B) / Rikio Takahashi /
description: waving purple and red forms across bottom area; yellow background; large, white, billowy form at upper center with pattern of untinted negative space; blue circle at center, overlaps irregular unprinted pattern; irregular green figure UL
